commands.name: az pipelines release definition list
commands.syntax:
az pipelines release definition list [--artifact-source-id]
                                     [--artifact-type {build, externaltfsbuild, git, github, jenkins, tfvc}]
                                     [--detect {false, true}]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--org]
                                     [--project]
                                     [--top]

commands.name: az pipelines release definition show
commands.summary: Get the details of a release definition.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines release definition show [--detect {false, true}]
                                     [--id]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--open]
                                     [--org]
                                     [--project]
